questions.question: Considering the overall form, what best describes the primary shape of this upholstered furniture piece?

What is the visible number of seat cushions forming the primary seating area?
What is the visual design of the back cushions, as viewed from the front?
Considering the armrests, describe their relative height compared to the overall seating surface?
Describe the discernible texture of the upholstery fabric; is it smooth, rough, or something else?
What is the apparent overall aesthetic or style of this sofa?
